name: robotlab-x
description: A cross platform desktop application for creating and running robots

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd server && yarn run electron-dev"
scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.remove-create-dir: yarn run clean-dirs && yarn run create-dirs
scripts.build-all: yarn run remove-create-dir && yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server && yarn run build-electron-all
scripts.build-win: yarn run remove-create-dir && yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server && yarn run build-electron-win && yarn run remove-package-folder && yarn run move-build
scripts.build-linux: yarn run remove-create-dir && yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server && yarn run build-electron-linux && yarn run remove-package-folder && yarn run move-build
scripts.build-mac: yarn run remove-create-dir && yarn run build-client && yarn run build-server && yarn run build-electron-mac && yarn run remove-package-folder && yarn run move-build
scripts.test: cd client && yarn run test-no-watch && cd ../server && yarn run test
scripts.test-coverage: cd client && yarn run test-coverage && cd ../server && yarn run test-coverage

author: GroG
